name: december
lyrics:
作词 : Tyson Yoshi/Gareth.T
作曲 : Tyson Yoshi/Gareth.T
制作人 : SilverStrike
I will always remember remember
我会一直记得
December December
十二月
When I look back this year
当我回头看向过去的一年
I think it'll worth all my tears
觉得流过的泪都值得
I will always remember remember
我会一直记得
December December
十二月
Feels like finally im there
终于到达了终点
I guess he answered my prayers
也许上帝听见了我的祷告
I blinked (you blinked?)
一眨眼
Its december
就到了十二月
But my mind still be in summer
可我似乎还停留在夏日
Too much went by can't remember (Oh shit)
太多事情发生可我毫无印象
But made some moves that they'll remember
但我所做的一切将会被所有人记住
(Wait what ??)
（什么?!）
I wrote hit songs back 2 back
写了无数hit song
My masterclass in lesson
我的深造班即将开课
10 thousand people saw me topless
一万人看见我*着上身
I turn super saiyan
我变身成为超级赛亚人
Ya they all tryna be idols
他们都挤破头想要成为爱豆
But I'm built lil different
但我的想法则不同
Never dreamt being famous
从来没有追求过成名
But that shit came knocking
但成功正按响我的门铃
At my door
就在门口
Cant ignore
无法忽视
Feels like for-ever
从未停歇
But I will always
我会一直
Remember remember
刻入脑海
December December
十二月
When I look back this year
当我回头看向过去的一年
I think it'll worth all my tears
觉得流过的泪都值得
But I will always
我会一直
Remember remember
刻入脑海
December December
十二月
When I look back this year
当我回头看向过去的一年
I think it'll worth all my tears
觉得流过的泪都值得
I will always remember remember
我会一直记得
December December
十二月
Feels like finally im there
终于到达了终点
I guess he answered my prayers
也许上帝听见了我的祷告
Hell of a year
该死的一年
I rid all my fears
撕碎了我的恐惧
I switch up my gears
换上全新的装备
Im seeing shit clear
看透一切事物
Told u one day that they'll all know my name
我说过的 总有一天他们都会知道我的名字
Pop open IG then you'll see my face
打开ig就能够看到我的照片
Chanel on my body
身上穿着香奈儿
It's hard to behave
守规矩不太容易
Nothing the same after I got the taste
成名后一切都不同了
The finest things in life
最好的事物
I got it all right now
我全部拥有
Oh Louis V
LV
Oh Tiffany
蒂凡尼
On my neck and on my wrist
在我身上配齐
As you can see
如你所见
The finest things in life
最好的事物
I got it all right now
我全部拥有
These Nike boxes they be filling up my living room
nike的鞋盒塞满了我的客厅
I got a chip upon my shoulder got somethings to prove
但还有东西需要我去证明
I will always
我会一直
Remember remember
记得
December December
十二月
When I look back this year
当我回头看向过去的一年
I think it'll worth all my tears
便感觉所有的泪水都值得
I will always remember remember
我会一直记得
December December
十二月
Feels like finally im there
终于到达终点
I guess he answered my prayers
应是上帝听见了我的祷告吧
I will always
我会一直
Remember remember
铭记在心
December December
十二月
When I look back this year
当我抵达终点
I think it'll worth all my tears
所有泪水与痛苦都值得
I will always remember remember
我会一直记得
December December
十二月
Feels like finally im there
抵达终点
I guess he answered my prayers
应是上帝回答了我的祷告吧
收起
